channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israeli Vote on Cease-Fire Is Delayed as Diplomats Work on Details
item.description: Even though negotiators for Israel and Hamas reached a provisional deal for a truce starting Sunday, they continued to discuss outstanding issues thro...

item.title: UnitedHealth CEO admits 3 major issues with the health system in first public comments since executive’s murder
item.description: Andrew Witty—who also said that 'the health system needs to function better'— made his comments during an earnings call reporting $14 billion in 2024 ...

item.title: Live Updates: Vote on Gaza Cease-Fire Delayed Amid Disagreements

item.title: Trump Is Said to Consider Executive Order to Circumvent TikTok Ban
item.description: The move is under discussion as the Chinese-owned app faces a Sunday deadline to find a new buyer or shut down in the United States.

item.title: Sudan’s Military Has Used Chemical Weapons Twice, U.S. Officials Say

item.title: Giuliani Keeps His Condo in Settlement of Defamation Case
item.description: An agreement allowed the former mayor of New York City to keep his apartments and other valuables in return for an undisclosed payment to two election...

item.title: TikTok influencers resist a move to Meta under the app’s looming ban. ‘The vibes are not the same’
item.description: There’s some apprehension about audience-building and monetization options on Meta.

item.title: Bob Uecker, Clubhouse Wit-Turned-Popular Sportscaster, Dies at 90
item.description: Uecker turned his meager baseball career into humorous fodder covering games on TV and as a commercial pitchman.

item.title: XRP and Solana ETPs could rake in as much as $14 billion, JPMorgan says
item.description: The banking giant projects each ETP could bring in $3 billion to $8 billion in investment.

item.title: David Lynch Dead: ‘Twin Peaks’ and ‘Mulholland Drive’ Director Was 78
item.description: A visionary, his films included “Eraserhead,” “Blue Velvet” and “Mulholland Drive.” He also brought his skewed view to the small screen with “Twin Pea...

item.title: Mark Carney Launches Bid to Be Canada’s Next Prime Minister
item.description: The former governor of the Canadian and British central banks announced he was running to become head of the Liberal Party and prime minister.

item.title: UnitedHealth CEO calls out pharmaceutical companies for inflating prices in first earnings call since executive was murdered
item.description: Revenue grew to over $400 billion, but still missed growth targets.

item.title: Ripple’s XRP breaks $3 for first time since 2018, nears all-time high
item.description: XRP surged 12% on speculation that Trump’s administration will support Ripple and the crypto industry.
